trends: There have been no other sightings in Sonora
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work around 2:45am, i got to notice a star-like object to the east. well i was coming into sonora, i was about a 1\4 of a mile where 31w and a local road 1136 intersected. well prior i noticed out of the corner of my eye a star-like object in the south that flew in front of the moon i payed it no attention because i assumed it was a plane. i looked again and to my amazement it literally shot into the sky very, very fast i really can't elaborate more on the very. well 2 miles down the road after i got into sonora a 2nd one was still in the east it followed me for the remander of my trip which was about 9 miles. i didn't want to look at it but i noticed a red hue to it. i don't know what they were but i was scared sh--less. (please note the first encounter was 20-25 secs. the 2nd was around 4-5 mins)
